inn1.comm: it's still hazy out there and the first ball seams away from Bopara who fends and gets beaten
massive appeal because this time Zaheer gets the ball to come back off the pitch and hit the right-hander on the pad, Tiffen says not out, it was a touch high
this one seams away from the right-hander, Bopara plays inside the line and lets it go
excellent start, Zaheer pitches on a good length in line with the stumps and moves the ball away from Bopara, he fends at it and gets beaten
defended on the back foot on the leg side

ah that's a poor ball to finish a terrific first over, Zaheer gives Bopara a full ball on the pads and Bopara flicks through midwicket and gets off the mark, the outfield is quick, Harbhajan has no chance
short of a length outside off stump, Bell waits on the back foot and plays on the off side
ah Bell came forward to cut that ball but he tried to hit it too hard, he ends up with a bottom edge that bounces towards the slips, there are two slips by the way
fuller length from Munaf just outside off stump, Bell moves forward and pushes towards the off side
short of a length from Munaf once again, Bell waits in his crease and shoulders arms
tight start from Munaf, his length is impeccable around the off stump, Bell gets behind the line and defends
and Munaf also goes the Zaheer way, he follows up five good balls with one on the pads and Bell leans across to glance the ball towards the fine-leg boundary
defended on the off side
Zaheer pitches on a good length in line with the stumps and slants across Bopara, he strides forward and shoulders arms
short of a length and the angle once again forces Bopara to let the ball go, 12 dots in the innings already
that's a bit wider outside off stump and Tiffen lets it go, and so did Bopara
Bopara opens the face of the bat to tap the short of a length ball behind point
fuller length and the line is straighter, Bell gets on to the front foot and defends
good length outside off stump, Bopara covers his off stump and watches the ball carry through to Dhoni
ah lovely ball, Munaf pitches on the length that draws Bopara forward and then seams the ball away from the edge of his bat
identical ball but this time Bopara strides forward and makes contact, he plays the ball towards point
terrific! Munaf hits the pitch hard just short of a length and gets the ball to seam and bounce away from Bopara, he fends and gets beaten, that ball carried through superbly to Dhoni
this one keeps a bit low and moves into the right-hander, Bopara lets it go outside off stump, he's left a large % of balls today

well well he's hit a four of the final ball of the over again, and it was a good shot! Bopara went on the back foot, got on top of the bounce, and drove the ball through cover point for four, excellent control
what bounce! Zaheer pitches the ball short of a length, the ball grips the pitch and takes off, beating Bell for bounce and seam movement
Bell opens the face to guide the ball towards third man
too full on the pads but this time Bopara's flick doesn't beat Harbhajan at midwicket
good length on off and middle stump, Bopara moves back to defend the ball on the off side
Bopara strides forward to defend a good length ball which angles into the right-hander after pitching around off stump
Zaheer hits a good length around off stump, Bopara moves forward and pushes the ball towards point
Bell uses his feet and comes forward to drive the ball to mid-off
Bell stays in his crease this time and opens the face to play the good-length ball to point, Yuvraj fields
Bell decides it's time to take it to Munaf, he charges down the pitch but Munaf sees him coming and shortens his length, Bell ends up swiping at the ball but misses the pull
defended towards the off side on the front foot
the line is a bit too straight and Bell whips the ball off his pads towards deep backward square leg
good length delivery outside off stump, defended on the front foot
Zaheer keeps it tight around the off stump, the batsman defends towards mid-off
short of a length on middle stump, Bell stays in his crease and plays the ball on the leg side
no room to work with for Bell and he once again pushes the ball to mid-on
Bell comes forward again and Zaheer gets the ball to bounce from a length and rap the batsman on the gloves
Bell pushes the ball firmly towards cover but the single is stopped by Raina who dives to his right and fields, super stop
Bell nudges the final ball off the over into the gap between midwicket and mid-on for a single

Bell gets a leading edge in the air but through the gap at cover, he had come forward to try and play the ball on the leg side but closed the face too early, the batsmen run two, Bopara wants a third but Bell sends him back
defended on the leg side, this time Bell stayed in his crease
oh he's smashed that! Munaf drops a little short and Bell gets into position quickly and pulls it over midwicket
that's short once again and Bell does extremely well to swivel and roll his wrists, he pulls the ball towards the long-leg boudnary, consecutive fours
and again! I think Bell's thrown Munaf off his usual length by coming down the track, Munaf bowls another short ball and Bell pulls through midwicket once again
good length delivery on off and middle, Bell gets behind the line and blocks
cracking shot! Bopara moves across his stumps and swings a short ball from Zaheer through square leg, lovely free swing of the bat and the ball races away
that's a super stroke but straight to the fielder, Bopara moved across and drove a length ball hard towards Gambhir at short cover
Zaheer goes round the wicket and angles the ball into the right-hander, Bopara defends on the off side
Zaheer pitches wide outside off stump and Bopara has a real go at it, however he doesn't make contact
that's lucky, the ball cuts back into Bopara who jabs his bat down at it, he gets an inside edge past his stumps, Dhoni sprints after the ball but can't reach it
Zaheer goes back over the stumps, Bopara defends on the off side
good length on off stump, Bell gets behind the line and blocks
Bell steps out of his crease to take the ball on the full, he drives the ball firmly past mid-off for four
that's full once again and Bell drives off the front foot, the shot is blocked by the fielder at short cover
Bell steps out once again, Ishant bowls it slightly shorter and the batsmen plays the ball towards midwicket
good length delivery angling into the right-hander, Bell moves forward and pushes towards mid-off
that's terrific improvisation! Bell takes two steps out of his crease to convert the length from good to full, he then uses his wrists to clip the ball firmly between midwicket and mid-on
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot towards point
Zaheer pitches on leg and middle, Bopara nudges through midwicket and wants the second run but Bell is content with one
Bell leaps out of his crease again but this time the length doesn't allow him to play an attacking shot, he defends back to the bowler
that's simply too short and Bell stays in his crease and pulls the ball from off stump towards the long leg boundary, he's hitting the ball well now
now Bell comes out of his crease and taps the length ball towards cover point, Bell's floating like a butterfly at the moment
dabbed behind point for a single
cut down to third man for a single
Ishant bowls a length ball at 136 kmh and angles into the right-hander, the ball seemed to stop on the batsman, Bopara defends on the leg side
good length outside off stump, Bopara moves forward and square drives to Yuvraj at point
Ishant bowls a slower ball which Bopara plays to point, but it's a no ball, a big no ball and Bopara will have a free-hit

free-hit, what drama, Bopara chases a wide ball and skies it high in the air, the catch is held at extra cover but it won't count, the batsmen ran one, and what's more Ishant had over-stepped again, a bigger no-ball this time
Bell charges and tries to blast the ball over extra cover, he gets a thick edge that flies past Dhoni's right glove for four to third man
Bell pushes the ball towards wide mid-off and sprints the single
length ball on middle stump, Bopara pushes on the leg side and runs the single, India's bowlers look a touch rattled
super short, Bopara stands tall, rides the bounce and drives the ball through point for four
this time he strides forward and opens the face to guide the ball towards Sharma at third man
Bell steps out of his crease and Munaf bowls a shorter ball, Bell chips it towards the fielder at long-on
short of a length outside off stump, Bopara glides towards Ishant at third man
driven off the back foot towards long-on for a single
that's a rash shot, the length is good outside off stump and Bopara chases it but gets beaten by the seam movement away from him
that's cut with awesome power, the length was short and there was width as well, Bell stayed in his crease and cracked it past Yuvraj, he's hit eight fours in his 44
defended on the front foot towards point
defended on the leg side on the front foot
Bell charges and pulls a length ball towards deep midwicket, Dhoni's placed Gambhir on the boundary
Bopara moves forward and drives towards cover
hammered through cover! Bopara stands on the back foot, gets on to of the bounce and smacks the ball through the infield, he hits it like a tennis player would put top-spin on the ball
Bell moves forward once again and defends on the leg side
short of a length outside off stump, Bopara moves back and drives on the up through cover

caught! Munaf has the wicket! It was a good length ball angling across the right-hander close to the off stump, Bell tried to run it towards third man and got a faint edge, Dhoni took a low catch in front of him
good length ball drifting into the pads, Pietersen gets off the mark by flicking towards deep midwicket
Bopara waits for the length ball to reach him and then opens the face to drive through point, Yuvraj moves quickly to his left and makes the save
punched off the back foot towards cover
fuller length on off and middle, Pietersen moved forward and drives towards mid-on
Pietersen moves forward and drives the length ball towards cover
short of a length just outside off stump, Pietersen stands on the back foot and punches towards the bowler
Pietersen moves forward and plays the ball towards Zaheer at long-on for a single
there's a bit of indecision between the batsmen after Bopara punches the ball towards extra cover, Raina dives to his right but pushes the ball away from him, which allows the single
Pietersen plays off his pads towards midwicket
bowled slowly through the air on off stump, defended on the off side
Bopara lunges forward and sweeps the ball into the gap between fine leg and deep square
he tries to do it again but doesn't make proper contact
Bopara moves forward to paddle sweep but gets a top edge into his body
driven off the front foot towards the off side
Bopara plays the paddle again and gets a top edge which lobs safely towards short fine leg
defended back to the bowler on the front foot
Harbhajan gets the ball to turn into the right-hander, Pietersen misses the flick and gets hit on the pad
nice flight from Harbhajan outside off stump, Bopara mis-times the drive but places it in the gap at extra cover
Pietersen moves back to Harbhajan and defends on the off side, there's some turn there for the offspinner
played off the back foot through square leg
Bopara moves across his stumps and nudges the ball from middle and leg behind square
Pietersen takes a large stride forward and drives the ball firmly towards the fielder on the sweeper boundary
there he goes! Pietersen charges Yuvraj and smashes him over the long-on boundary even though there was a fielder in the deep, terrific shot
nudged on the leg side for a single
Bopara works the ball into the wide open spaces at midwicket for a single
that's hammered and brilliantly saved! Pietersen crashed the ball through covers and Raina dived to his right and stopped the boundary
played behind square for a single, Yuvraj took 4 for 28 in Indore, England are going after him today

Pietersen's gone! He tried to treat Harbhajan like he treated Yuvraj, he charged down the track and aimed for the stands at long-on, he was beaten by Harbhajan's flight and mis-hit the ball high in the air towards long-off where Zaheer took the catch, massive wicket for India
bowled flatter through the air on off stump, Collingwood defends on the off side
Collingwood tries to play the ball on the leg side but defends
loud appeal for lbw as Collingwood tries to close the face but misses, that ball pitched outside off and turned, the impact was outside the line of off stump though
played off the back foot towards midwicket
Collingwood goes right back and nudges the ball off his pads towards short fine leg, Harbhajan finishes a wicket maiden
flat ball on off stump, Bopara moves back and plays towards long off
Collingwood punches off the back foot but Yuvraj dives to his left and cuts it off
defended on the leg side off the front foot
Collingwood comes down the track but ends up playing it back to the bowler
flighted delivery and Collingwood drives stowards long-off to get off the mark
driven towards deep cover for two to end the over
tossed up on off stump, Collingwood strides forward and blocks

done in by the doosra! That's a terrific combination of flight and turn! The length drew Collingwood forward and he really had to lunge to reach the ball, it drifted away from him and he lost balance and dragged his back leg out of the crease, the ball went the other way and Dhoni whipped off the bails
defended on the front foot by Flintoff
Flintoff moves forward once again and blocks
bowled flat on middle and leg stump, Flintoff works the ball off his pads for one
Bopara gets on to the front foot and pushes the ball towards cover point to retain strike
tossed up slowly by Yuvraj on off stump, Bopara defends towards point
driven off the front foot towards long off for a single
bowled flatter to Flintoff, the batsman gets on to the front foot and defends on the off side
played into the gap at cover point for a single
Yuvraj drifts on to leg stump and Bopara gets two by moving back and driving the ball towards wide long-on
defended towards the bowler on the front foot
Flintoff strides forward and nudges the ball behind point, Bopara calls Flintoff through for the single
played off the pads towards midwicket, Harbhajan is giving the ball air
Bopara moves back and works the ball off his pads behind square
that nearly carried! Flintoff moved back and chipped the ball tamely towards the bowler, the ball fell just short of Harbhajan, that was similar to the Collingwood dismissal in Indore
Flintoff comes forward to defend but misses and gets hit on the pad
defended off the back foot
Bopara reaches fifty in style, he latches on to a full ball and blazes the cover drive into the gap on the cover boundary, well played Ravi! He's moved up from No 8 to No 1 and made it count
driven down the ground for one
Flintoff strides forward and drives towards long on for a single
Bopara strides forward once again and drives the ball firmly towards long off
Yuvraj keeps the ball full and Flintoff drives towards the fielder at long off
Bopara moves back and nudges the ball towards midwicket for one more
defended on the back foot towards the bowler
Bopara moves back to cut the ball through point but mis-times the shot
tossed up on off stump, Bopara defends on the front foot
Harbhajan slips in a quicker one and Bopara plays it back to the bowler, he was looking to nudge it on the leg side
this time he moves back and nudges off his pads
Bopara moves on to the back foot and punches towards mid-on
Flintoff stays in his crease and drives Yuvraj towards cover point
fuller length and Flintoff strides forward to drive towards long-off
bowled extremely slowly through the air, Bopara stays in his crease and punches towards long-on
Flintoff moves back and drives the ball hard towards cover point, there are four fielders in the ring on the off side
played down the ground and Flintoff ambles the single
tossed up on middle stump, Bopara drives towards the bowler
Flintoff defends on the off side
Harbhajan pitches outside off and turns the ball into the right-hander, Flintoff moves back and hits the ball with the spin through midwicket
Bopara nudges towards square
pushed off the back foot towards mid-on
that's too short and Flintoff dismisses the ball from his presence with a powerful pull, he finds the fielder in the deep though
driven to long on for a single
that's wide down leg side, it's the first wide of the day
Bopara moves across and plays the ball to the fielder at short fine leg
Bopara gets down on one knee and sweeps over the fielder at short fine leg, this is Bopara's highest score in ODIs
that's down leg side again but Bopara hits it straight to Harbhajan at short fine leg
defended on the leg side

Yuvraj's got him! Terrific ball! Yuvraj drifts the ball into the right-hander, the length draws Bopara out of his crease, the ball dips on him and beats the batsman in flight, then it pitches and spins past the outside edge leaving Dhoni with an easy stumping to complete
defended on the back foot behind point
thats four, good use of his feet and drives wide of extra cover
quicker and shorter, pushing Flintoff onto the back foot, and he has to hustle to push the ball towards point, who swoops in to stop the single
tossed up on leg stump and he classily on-drives to midwicket
tossed up a length and Shah defends it back patiently
there's a sweep now, hit in the air wide of square leg but it drops safely in front of Munaf in the deep
flatter on middle and leg and turned wide of square leg
excellent flight on off and middle stump, driven down the ground for a single
driven off the front foot to long-off
this one kept low outside off stump, Flintoff tries to play off the back foot and got an inside edge on to the pad
defended on the off side
played off the back foot towards deep cover for a single
that's a full toss, Shah was on the front foot so he pushed it into the gap at deep midwicket for two
that's a full ball and Flintoff drives it back towards Harbhajan who dives to his right and stops the ball, he gets into a tangle with the non-striker and is in a bit of pain
Flintoff dabs the ball towards point for a single
that's a funny shot, Shah wanted to drive towards cover but the ball spun into him and went towards the leg side
driven off the back foot on the off side
Shah moves back in his crease and drives towards long-on
defended on the off side
the ball stops and turns away from Shah who gets caught on the back foot, he gets an outside edge towards point
Shah moves a long long way across his stumps and flicks the ball off his pads, England reach 150
Flintoff drives hard towards cover but Raina cuts it off
driven back to the bowler on the front foot
flighted delivery on off stump, Flintoff moves forward and defends
tossed up once again and Flintoff cuts off the back foot towards Harbhajan at point, Dhoni has four fielders in the circle on the off side for Flintoff
that's wide down leg side, Dhoni whips off the bails but Shah is safe
Shah moves right back and then opens the face to guide the ball which turns into him behind point
Flintoff defends back to the bowler
Flintoff tries to step out but changes his mind and defends on the off side
Flintoff pushes the ball off the front foot towards mid-off for one
Shah whips the ball off his pads for a single to deep square
defended back to the bowler, only four off that over
pushed through point off the back foot
Flintoff moves back and plays the ball towards the bowler
that's outstanding! Flintoff makes a bit of room and lofts the ball inside out over extra cover for four
pushed on the off side towards mid-off and they manage a single despite the four fielders in the circle
Shah knocks the ball into the vacant space at midwicket and takes two
pushed off the front foot towards cover, Yuvraj ends his spell, he's taken 1 for 54
short of a length delivery outside off stump, Flintoff tries to force the ball through the off side but misses
this time Flintoff powers the short and wide ball through cover, Ishant has protection on the boundary
fuller length on the pads, Shah flicks between square leg and midwicket and shouts "Yeah!"
length delivery on off stump, driven firmly off the front foot but straight to the fielder at short cover
Shah stays in his crease and places the ball into the gap between point and cover by opening the face of the bat
Flintoff backs away a fraction and drives a ball from his stumps towards point
Shah steps right across his stumps, exposing middle and leg, and works Yusuf behind square

lbw!! Flintoff's gone! Yusuf bowls a flat and straight delivery, Flintoff moves across his stumps to try and work the ball on the leg side, he misses and gets hit in front of middle stump, that's plumb and umpire Tiffen agrees, that's the second time in row that Flintoff's been lbw to a spinner while trying to hit across the line
played off the pads behind square Samit's off the mark
defended on the leg side
driven down the ground towards long-on
worked off the pads through midwicket for a single
defended on the leg side, Sehwag moves to his right and stops it
tapped towards long-on for a single
loud appeal for a catch down the leg side, Sehwag drifted past leg stump and Shah missed the flick, no wide called so that must have been pad
worked off the pads into the gap at deep midwicket
driven off the back foot towards long on for one more
Sehwag pitches outside off stump and turns the ball into the right-hander, Patel defends on the leg side
Shah takes a step forward and drives towards long-on, the batsmen stroll a single
Patel moves back and flicks the ball behind square for a single
Shah moves back and across and plays the ball towards deep midwicket
bowled flat and straight, Patel defends with a straight bat
defended on the front foot towards midwicket
pushed towards midwicket once again
played off the pads towards the leg side, Zaheer began with a slower one
defended off the back foot towards the off side
good length from Zaheer on leg and middle, Patel knocks it towards the leg side
full ball on middle and off stump, Patel moves forward and defends towards the bowler
good length from Zaheer on middle stump, Patel stays in his crease and pushes the ball towards deep midwicket
Zaheer fires in a full delivery outside off stump, Shah chases and misses, only two runs of the first over of the batting Powerplay, Dhoni will be pleased
Patel moves back and across to nudge the ball off his hips towards square leg, where are the big shots?
short of a length outside off stump, Patel stands on the back foot and punches towards cover point, he can't beat the infield
Patel tries to drive a ball which angles into him down the ground, he gets an inside edge on to pad and the ball rolls wide of Dhoni
it's just not happening for England, Ishant delivered a clever slower ball outside off stump, Shah didn't even attempt a shot
Shah tries to pull another slower ball from outside off but mis-times it
Dhoni had just brought third man into the circle and Patel edges the ball between the wicketkeeper and short third man for four
Shah's hit that hard! It was a length ball and Shah came forward and hit through the line to the long-off boundary
Zaheer replies with a fast yorker outside off stump and beats the bat
that's a full toss outside off stump and Shah swipes across the line, he gets a bottom edge into the ground towards Dhoni
another full toss outside off stump, Shah drives the ball through cover and the batsmen run the second after a fumble from Harbhajan on the boundary
Shah waits for a short of a length ball to angle across him and then steers it towards the third man boundary, Yusuf hurtles towards the ball and throws himself full length to save the four
Zaheer bowls a yorker to end the over, Patel digs it out towards midwicket
Ishant fires one into the blockhole, Shah digs it out towards the bowler
Ishant angled the slower ball into the right-hander, Shah closed the face too early and got a leading edge on to the off side
Ishant was looking for the yorker but bowled a low full toss, Shah played it towards mid-on
short of a length outside off stump, Patel taps it off the back foot towards point
nifty footwork from Sehwag, Shah reaches out for a wide one and slices it in the air towards the third man boundary, Sehwag races across the boundary and knocks it back in with his foot
Shah drives a length delivery on the up through cover, Gambhir moves quickly across the boundary and picks up the ball with one hand
Patel pushes the ball off the front foot towards point
bowled flat through the air from round the stumps, defended back to the bowler
phenomenal sweep! Shah gets down on one knee and hits the ball powerfully into the gap between long leg and deep backward square

Harbhajan gets ODI wicket No 200! He bowls a flat ball on off stump from over the wicket, Shah tries to loft over the long-off boundary but can't get under the ball, he hits it flat and straight to Zaheer who runs forward to take the catch
Patel moves back and flicks the ball firmly towards midwicket, the ball looks like it's going to beat the infield but Raina dives to his right and makes the save

is that run out? Prior pushes the ball towards the leg side and sets off for the single, Patel sees Raina swooping on the ball and sends Prior back, the throw from Raina is a bit high and Prior is safe as Dhoni breaks the stumps, he was just in
Patel rocks back and pulls the short ball over midwicket to the fielder in the deep, he made solid contact
short of a length on middle stump, defended on the back foot towards the bowler
Ishant steams in and hits the blockhole with a fast yorker, Prior does well to keep it out
Prior steps out of his crease and Ishant shortens his length, Prior readjusts and cuts but can't beat the fielder at point
full ball nearly in the blockhole, Prior manages to force it past the bowler for one
Ishant's over-stepped yet again! That's the third one in the innings! Patel drives straight for a single, free-hit coming up
Prior backs away to smash the ball on the off side but gets an outside edge towards third man
full ball in the blockhole, dug out towards point, the batsmen decide against the second despite a fumble from Yuvraj
that's full and wide outside off stump, too wide and Zaheer will have to re-bowl it
Zaheer bowls the ball full on leg stump, Prior backs away and drives towards mid-off where Raina sprints in for the run-out but doesn't pick up the ball cleanly
finally England hit a six! Patel charges and smashes a length ball from Zaheer high and far over wide long-on
full and wide outside off stump, Patel squeezes it out towards the deep point boundary
pushed towards mid-on for a quick single, good over for England, 13 off it
Ishant looks for the yorker and Patel plays it towards the off side for a single
Prior attempts a wild heave over the leg side but gets completely foxed by a slower ball that just misses the leg stump
now he's got beaten by another lower one, this time outside off stump, Ishant's over-stepped yet again, that's his fourth, a criminal offence in this age of free-hits
Prior swings and misses the free hit outside off stump but would you believe it, Ishant's over-stepped one more time, Prior gets another opportunity
Ishant's lost it today, the ball slips out of his hand and goes way down leg side, Dhoni had no hope to reaching that and the ball goes down for five wides, the free hit carries over to the next ball
Prior chips the free hit towards midwicket, and Ishant hasn't over-stepped this time!

caught in the deep! Patel charges to loft Ishant down the ground, it's another slower ball from Ishant and Patel mis-hits it high in the air towards long-off where Raina settles under the catch and takes it easily

what a crazy over this is! Ishant's now on a hat-trick! Prior walks across his stumps to try and flick the ball towards long leg, he misses and the ball swings past him and clips leg stump. Two no balls, one wide that cost five, and two wickets in the over so far
and he's sprayed it wide outside off stump! It's a huge wide!
good length outside off stump, Broad swings and misses
Zaheer bowls it full outside off stump, Swann comes forward and drives through the off side
Zaheer bowls a full toss - he was looking for the yorker - and it swings into Broad and hits him on the pad, they run a leg bye
Zaheer bowls a slower offcutter which beats Swann's poke outside off stump
short of a length from Zaheer, Swann taps the ball towards midwicket

caught! Zaheer fires a short ball at Stuart Broad who gets surprised and attempts to hook, he gets an edge which lobs up to Dhoni who takes an easy catch, England are in danger of leaving some deliveries unused
he tries to work a ball on the leg side but misses and gets hit on the pad
Anderson cuts but Yuvraj dives full length to his right and makes the save at point
Swann chips the ball in the air and just manages to clear Harbhajan at midwicket, he runs two and keeps strike
Munaf's attempted yorker ends up as a low full toss and Swann hits it towards long-on

knocked him over! Munaf bowls on a good length and dead straight, Anderson backs away and tries to open the face, he misses and the ball knocks middle stump out of the ground, England have been dismissed with two balls to go in the innings

inn2.comm: good length ball on off stump, Gambhir moves forward and opens the face to play the ball towards third man
good ball, Anderson hits the pitch just short of a length and seams the ball away from Sehwag, he begins to fend at it but pulls his bat out of the way
defended on the front foot towards point
fuller length outside off stump, Sehwag leans forward and drives through gully to get off the mark
full delivery from Anderson, Gambhir moves forward and drives back to the bowler with a perfectly straight bat, Anderson stops the shot with his boot
defended off the back foot towards cover
big swing for Broad! He pitches short of a length outside off stump, Sehwag lets it go and the ball cuts back a long way after it passes the batsman
good length and the ball climbs on Sehwag just outside off stump, he pulls his bat out of the way just in time
fuller length outside off stump, Sehwag strides forward and lets it go, the ball keeps low and bounces a second time before reaching Prior
this one hits the pitch and carries through nicely to Prior after Sehwag lets it go outside off stump
defended on the leg side on the back foot
good length delivery outside off stump, Sehwag strides forward and shoulders arms as the ball seams away from him, Broad starts with a maiden
that's too full and Gambhir moves forward, gets to the pitch of the ball, and drives through the gap at cover, super shot, picture perfect
this times he mis-times the drive on the offside
good length on middle and off stump, Gambhir stays in his crease and defends on the off side
Gambhir takes two steps out of his crease but has to defend once Anderson adjusts to a shorter length
short, wide and crashed through point! Gambhir remained in his crease and freed his arms to cut the ball fiercely through point
fuller ball on leg stump, Gambhir tries to flick but misses, the ball brushes his pad on its way through to Prior
short of a length on off stump, defended on the back foot
banged in short and Sehwag moves back and takes one hand off the bat while defending
Broad bowls the short one down leg side this time, that's a wide
Sehwag loses patience and chases a length ball outside off stump, that was a wild swing and was no where near making contact
Broad's let him off the hook! All that pressure - 10 dot balls - has been released by a full and straight ball, Sehwag flicks it firmly into the gap between midwicket and mid-on
good length outside off stump, Sehwag strides forward and lets it go
Sehwag moves on to the back foot and chips a short of a length ball towards midwicket
that's a dreadful delivery to Sehwag, full on leg stump, Sehwag clips it in the air through backward square leg for four
that's better, short of a length angling into the right-hander from outside off stump, Sehwag gets behind the line and defends with a straight bat
full length once again and Sehwag flicks through square leg, Pietersen has a man in the deep now
short of a length, angling across the left-hander, Gambhir waits for the ball and guides it towards third man
tight line and length around off stump, Sehwag defends on the front foot with bat and pad close together
Sehwag jumps back and across and whips a short of a length ball off his hips towards the long-leg boundary, the fielder was square and he placed it fine, poor line
full length on leg and middle, Gambhir moves across and flicks towards square leg
good length delivery on off stump, Gambhir defends on the off side

he's hit that! The length was a bit short and Gambhir picked it up so early so that he merely transferred his weight on to the back foot after he had made a forward movement and pulled it in front of midwicket for four
pushed off the front foot towards the off side
pushed off the front foot towards cover
Gambhir tried to flay that through covers, he really threw all his power into the attempted drive but missed the length delivery
good length outside off stump, Sehwag lets it go through to Prior
Flintoff sends down a short delivery and Sehwag ducks under the challenge
fuller length outside off stump, Sehwg moves forward and drives towards mid-off, he didn't time that well
Sehwag jumps on to the back foot and flicks behind square for one

caught at third man! Gambhir gives Flintoff the charge and throws his bat at a short of a length delivery outside off stump, the ball flies off the thick edge and goes straight to Broad at third man, England have the early breakthrough
short of a length delivery angling into the left-hander, Raina plays inside the line
Sehwag once again jumps back and plays the short of a length ball off his hips towards fine leg
Broad hurries Raina with a short ball, Raina was in two minds whether to fend or avoid it and gets hit on the body
fuller and wider outside off stump, Raina chases the ball and gets beaten by the angle across him
defended on the back foot on the leg side
that's a bizarre shot, Raina tries to pull the short ball from outside off stump, he barely moved his feet and missed completely
Raina defends the last ball towards the bowler, Broad clearly rattled Raina in that over
Sehwag gets a bit of width outside off from Flintoff and he cuts the ball hard towards third man
Raina's nearly cracked it on to his stumps! He pushed at the ball without moving his feet and inside-edged it past his stumps, he's off the mark in lucky fashion
Sehwag gets behind the line of a short of a length delivery and defends with a straight bat
Sehwag stays in his crease and plays the ball on the leg side
Flintoff angles a length ball into the right-hander, Sehwag pushes towards mid-on and Raina sets off for the single, Sehwag sends him back and rightly so for Pietersen had got to the ball quickly
short of a length outside off stump, Sehwag sways out of the way

he's bowled him!! Raina has looked completely out of sorts! His feet stayed rooted to the crease as he tried to drive a length delivery, which angled across him, on the up, Raina was aiming for the cover boundary but heard the ball cannon into the stumps off the inside edge
pushed towards the leg side for a single, that was a risky one ... oops that came off the pad and went towards square leg
Sehwag moves across and tries to flick but misses and gets hit on the thigh
the slower ball outside off stump, Sehwag waits for it and cuts the ball past point for a single
Broad fires in a yorker, Sharma keeps his balance and digs it out, that was 145kmh
tight line and length on off and middle, defended back to the bowler with a straight bat, India have scored only 36 off the first Powerplay
Sehwag moves forward and drives a length ball through the off side, Pietersen has a fielder on the cover boundary
Flintoff bowls a short one and Sharma drops his wrists and sways out of the line of the ball
another short one from Flintoff and Sharma bends out of the way once again
fuller and straighter from Freddie, Sharma defends back to the bowler
short of a length on middle stump, Sharma stays in his crease and defends on the leg side
played off the pads towards midwicket for a single
length delivery on off stump, Sehwag defends on the off side
short of a length on off stump, Sehwag stays in his crease and defends on the off side
Sehwag moves back and across to whip a short ball off his hips towards deep square leg, both feet were off the ground when bat made contact with the ball
he jumps back this time and defends towards the bowler, Broad picks up and threatens to throw it at the batsman
take that says Sehwag! He waits for the slower ball and blitzes it with a flat bat over the bowler's head, Broad stuck his hand up but that was well after the ball passed him
and again! this time the length is full and Sehwag drives off the front foot past mid-on, this is turning out into a tight little contest
Sharma places the ball into the gap at extra cover and gets off the mark, he actually wanted to play it on the leg and got a leading edge
Sehwag moves back and across and guides the ball towards third man
banged in short outside off stump, Sharma rides the bounce and taps the ball down towards third man
short of a length and Sehwag jumps up to defend it down on the pitch
loud appeal from Flintoff but he gets no real support from the fielders behind the stumps, Sehwag swishes at a length ball outside off stump but misses
140 kmh, on a good length outside off stump, Sehwag stays on the back foot and blocks
good length delivery outside off stump, Sharma merely defends towards the off side
Sharma moves forward and across his stumps and drives a full ball which angles into him towards mid-on
Sharma's hit this nicely, he stood tall on the back foot and punched it through the gap at cover, he didn't hit that hard at all, merely timed it into the gap
short of a length once again and Sharma defends on the off side
that was poor, the line was too far down leg side and Sharma whipped it off his pads to the fine leg boundary, the length was too full as well
that's possibly the shot of the day! Sharma had a bit of width to work with and he freed his arms to cut the ball with tremendous power behind point, Anderson continues to be expensive
that was over-pitched from Flintoff and Sehwag came forward and hammered the drive towards mid-off, he didn't find the gap though
full ball angling into the right-hander, Sehwag clips it off his pads towards mid-on
that's a curious shot, the length wasn't short enough to pull, the line was outside off stump, Sehwag tried to pull it anyway and hit it to Anderson at mid-on
ah the previous ball was a dress rehearsal for this one, Sehwag goes on to the back foot a bit quicker and pulls the short ball between midwicket and mid-on for four
width offered outside off stump and Sehwag cuts hard to the fielder at third man
Flintoff wanted to bowl the yorker but ended up delivering a full toss on the pads, Sharma pushed it wide of Anderson at mid-on for a single
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot towards cover
Anderson bowls a length delivery outside off stump, Sharma waits for it and steers it towards third man
defended on the off side
Sehwag cuts the wide ball extremely hard but Collingwood intercepts it and nonchalantly throws the ball back to Prior as if it was a routine stop
this time Sehwag moves forward and blasts the length ball in front of point for four, he hit that extremely hard
played through midwicket for a single
Sehwag opens the face and guides the ball towards short third man
chipped in the air but the ball falls short of the fielder at long-on
Swann bowls it wide outside off stump, Sharma reaches out for it and drives through cover for two
Sharma leans forward and nudges towards midwicket
Prior appeals for lbw but the ball hit the pad a long way outside off stump, Sharma was trying to play towards midwicket
Sharma reaches out for a full ball outside off but gets beaten on the drive
played along the ground through midwicket for a single
Sharma nudges the ball into the wide open spaces on the leg side
Sehwag moves forward and defends with a straight bat
Sehwag moves forward and closes the face to work the ball into the leg side, there are no fielders in the circle so the batsmen run two as the ball goes towards wide long-on
driven firmly down the ground towards long-on, Sehwag came down the track and hit it hard

dropped, what a costly miss that is but it was a difficult chance, Sehwag stepped out and hit the ball hard towards Patel's right, he went for the catch with one hand, he seemed to catch it but lost balance and I think his foot somehow managed to kick the ball out of the hand
defended on the off side
driven down the ground for one
Sehwag tries to play the reverse sweep but misses
that's Sehwag's fifty! He gets there by charging Swann and blasting him over the cow-corner boundary, well played
driven towards long-on for a single
defended on the back foot towards the bowler
Sehwag skips out of his crease and flicks the ball through midwicket, he wants to get after the slow bowlers
Sharma moves back and punches a flat delivery through extra cover
Sehwag tries to come down the pitch again but Patel drops the ball short, Sehwag hits the ball along the ground towards long-on
Sharma stays in his crease and lofts the ball high over extra cover, superb timing and the placement is perfect
driven off the back foot towards long-off for one more
the length is short and Sehwag rocks back and pulls the ball towards wide long-on, Anderson runs to his right and fields but the batsmen run two
Sharma nudges the ball towards the off side
defended on the off side
Sehwag gets down on one knee and sweeps towards the fielder on the deep square leg boundary
Sharma tries to hit the ball on the leg side but inside edges it on to his boot
this one keeps a touch low and Sharma defends towards the bowler
defended towards midwicket, three dot balls in a row to end the over
pushed on the off side by Sehwag, there was some turn for KP
Sharma plays the ball off his pads towards square leg
turn and bounce! The ball jags back into Sharma who gets caught by surprise on the back foot
pushed towards midwicket on the back foot
Sharma tries to force the ball through the leg side but can't get it past midwicket
Sharma cuts the final ball of the over towards deep point, Broad is the fielder and the batsmen run two before his throw reaches Prior
Sehwag moves back to cut and hits the ball from very close to off stump through cover
Sharma waits for a full ball and taps it down the ground for another single
Sehwah steps out to Swann and smashes the ball hard, Sharma hurriedly got out of the way and Anderson did superbly to run, slide and stop the ball on the long-on boundary
caught! Sharma moved back to cut the ball but it was too close to off stump, he got a thick edge and Prior took a sharp catch, England have broken through
bowled flat through the air on off stump, defended on the front foot
tossed up on off stump, Yuvraj leans forward and drives through cover to get off the mark
Yuvraj leans forward and closes the face of the bat to play the offbreak from KP from middle stump towards fine leg
that's a deft shot, Sehwag waits for the ball outside off stump and cuts it late, so late that the fielder at short third man has no chance
Sehwag backs away and cuts the ball towards short third man, that ball turned
pushed into the gap at cover point on the back foot
flighted delivery nearly in the blockhole, Yuvraj comes forward and drives the ball firmly down the ground
driven off the front foot through cover for a single to end the over
Yuvraj gets down on one knee, uses the angles into him from round the wicket, and sweeps powerfully to the deep square leg boundary
driven off the front foot towards long-off
Sehwag moves back and cuts the ball hard to cover, that was close to off stump
played through midwicket for a single
Yuvraj lets one go outside off stump
tossed up on middle stump, Yuvraj moves forward and drives the ball towards long-on, he will keep the strike
Flintoff angles into Yuvraj's pads and the batsman nudges behind square for a single, ah it came off his pad, not bat

caught! That flew to Collingwood at tremendous speed and he plucked it out of the air, the length was a bit short and the line was a bit wide, the room was there for the cut and Sehwag smashed it, the ball flew above Collingwood's head at point and he jumped in the air to take a sharp catch, terrific effort and the crowd is stunned into silence, I don't think Collingwood believed he had caught it either!
He strides forward and pushes a length delivery towards deep point
defended on the off side
Dhoni swishes and misses a length ball outside off stump
good length delivery outside off stump, Dhoni lets it go
Yuvraj moves back and across and nudges the ball off his pads for one more
Dhoni lunges forward and defends towards the bowler
Dhoni moves deep into his crease and pushes a delivery which keeps low into the gap at cover point
Yuvraj leans forward and tucks the ball off his pads behind square
Dhoni moves forward and defends towards cover
Dhoni strides forward once again and blocks a straight delivery from Swann
short of a length outside off stump, Yuvraj lets it go, Flintoff has a chat with Yuvraj
Yuvraj gets on to the front foot, leans into a cover drive, and hits a length ball towards the boundary
Dhoni stays in his crease and defends on the off side
Dhoni moves across his stumps and tries to pull, he misses and gets hit on the body, the ball falls by his feet and Dhoni kicks it away from the stumps
tight line and length from Flintoff who's beginning to eye-ball the batsman, Dhoni defends back to the bowler
Dhoni leans forward and pushes towards the off side, Flintoff runs around and fields
Yuvraj moves right back and drives the ball into the gap at wide long-on, the batsmen jog the second
Yuvraj defends a flat ball delivered from round the stumps towards the emptiness in the infield on the leg side and runs the single
defended back to the bowler
Swann beats Dhoni and Prior whips off the bails, Dhoni's back foot did not move
Dhoni lunges forward and defends towards point
Dhoni gets out of his crease but blocks towards the off side
Broad drifts on to the pads from round the wickets, the ball brushes Yuvraj's pads, after he misses the leg-glance, and goes towards fine leg
Dhoni tries to cut but gets a bottom edge past his stumps towards the wicketkeeper
defended on the back foot towards the bowler
Dhoni strides forward and defends a length delivery towards cover
short, wide and hammered! Dhoni gets under the ball and cuts hard, the ball flies over the infield and races to the point boundary
driven towards deep extra cover for a single
Dhoni wanted to step out but Swann bowled a flatter and quicker ball and hit Dhoni on the pad
driven back to the bowler on the front foot
Dhoni moves back and plays the ball off his pads behind square
Yuvraj moves forward and nudges the ball in front of point for one
Dhoni moves forward and pushes the ball towards midwicket
Yuvraj nearly yorked himself by coming forward to Swann, he brought his bat down and edged the ball on to his pad and past the stumps
Broad bowls a super slow ball outside off stump and beats Dhoni on the cut
Dhoni tries to force the ball on the off side but gets an inside edge towards the bowler
short of a length on off and middle, Dhoni plays the ball towards cover point and screams "No, No!" as he sees Yuvraj running for the single, Yuvraj gets back in time
driven off the front foot towards Collingwood at point
Dhoni moves across and nudges a good length ball from middle stump towards midwicket
a good length ball on off stump, Dhoni drives off the front foot but can't beat the fielder at cover
Yuvraj moves back and nudges the ball off his pads through midwicket
cut hard off the back foot but straight to the fielder at point
Dhoni moves back and defends a flat ball towards cover
defended on the off side
played behidn square leg, the situation is getting tighter
Yuvraj stays on the back foot and opens the face to guide the ball towards point
Anderson's struggle continues, Yuvraj stands on the front foot and pulls the short ball between midwicket and mid-on for four, none of the fielders moved, the light is fading in Kanpur
sprayed wide outside off stump, Tiffen signals wide
Yuvraj pushes hard at the ball angling across him and gets a thick edge towards third man for a single
Dhoni tries to work the ball on the leg side but gets hit on the pad, they run a leg bye
played with an open face behidn point for one more
Dhoni decides to go after Anderson and attempts to heave down the ground, he gets an inside edge past his stumps for four
Yuvraj works the ball off his pads past the fielder at short fine leg, the running is excellent and they run the second
Yuvraj charges the bowler and lofts the ball cleanly over the long-on boundary, that's his ninth six of the series, superb timing
driven firmly down the ground towards long-off for two more
Yuvraj clears his front foot out of the way and swipes at the ball, he hits the ball past the fielder at short fine leg and gets two more
another single down the ground, Yuvraj drives towards long off
Dhoni nudges the ball off his pads for a single
he gives Dhoni a length delivery outside off stump and Dhoni drives the ball hard through extra cover for four
a huge huge appeal from Flintoff, Dhoni was beaten as he fended at a length delivery outside off stump, Flintoff roared and roared but Tiffen said not out, Prior didn't appeal immediately
Dhoni lofts the ball over cover for  a single to bring up the 50 partnership
Flintoff bowls a searing yorker and Dhoni does supremely to dig it out towards midwicket
Flintoff angles a short ball at Yuvraj's body and he mis-times the pull to midwicket, Flintoff gives Yuvraj a long hard stare

stunned silence at Green Park! Yuvraj goes after a short ball from Flintoff and tries to pull, he gets cramped for room by the angle into him from round the wicket and hits it in the air towards deep square leg, Broad runs to his left and holds the catch
Broad bowls one down leg side, Dhoni misses the leg glance and it's called wide
the slower short ball, Dhoni waits for it and plays a short arm jab that splits the gap between short fine leg and deep backward square leg
driven down the ground for a single
Broad swings a full ball into the right-hander, Yusuf Pathan mis-times the drive towards mid-off but he's off the mark
full ball outside off stump, driven off the front foot towards cover
Broad slips in a slower ball and beats the bat, Yusuf fends and gets beaten outside off
Broad strays on to the pads and Yusuf works the ball towards square leg
Flintoff bangs the ball in short and angles it into the right-hander, Yusuf nudges towards the leg side, England need wickets to stay in this game
that's clever! Flintoff bangs the ball in short and Yusuf merely opens the face and uses the pace to guide the ball to the third man boundary
Flintoff's attempted yorker goes awry and Yusuf clips the full toss off his pads to the deep square leg boundary
full and straight from Flintoff, Yusuf pushes the ball towards midwicket
Flintoff bowls an excellent yorker and Yusuf can't do much but dig it out on the leg side, in fact he did well to dig it out on the leg side
another super yorker and Yusuf waits for it and drives towards point
Dhoni moves back and cuts through the off side
defended on the front foot
the ball keeps low but Yusuf watchfully defends on the off side
defended on the back foot towards the leg side
Yusuf leans forward and pushes the ball through midwicket for a single
defended on the front foot towards the off side
Yusuf blocks towards midwicket
Pietersen drifts down leg side, Yusuf comes forward and misses, Prior can't collect and that's a stumping opportunity wasted
played off the pads behind square for a single
Dhoni moves forward and defends on the off side
tossed up on off stump, Dhoni strides forward and blocks
Dhoni moves forward and nudges the ball off his pads behind square
